    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Advance()
      This method will return true if this virus can advance.
      void blowup()
      This method will remove both right and left head and fused tiles, destroy all FuseViruses on screen, delete tiles under them, and add corruption as well as put corruption in their place
      boolean isBot()
      returns true if this is the bottom FuseVirus of a pair
      void markForDelete()
      Deactivate (but do not mark for delete) this FuseVirus if the counterpart is also deactivated, mark for delete both BOT and TOP as well as any contiguous FUSED types
      void setType(FuseVirus.FuseVirusTypes _Type)
      sets the type of the fuseVirus (this determines behavior and texture)
      void spawn()
      This method picks a horizontal position based on a random tile and spawns a FuseVirus at the top and bottom of the grid at that horizontal position the command is ignored if there are no tiles
      void spawnAtLocation(IntVector loc)
      Spawn a pair of fuseViruses at a horizontal position based on a given position the BOT side spawns at the bottom of the grid and the TOP side spawns at the top
      void spread()
      update method to use on the Virus spread phase
      void TurnBasedUpdate()
      nothing happens in the FuseVirus turnBasedUpdate everything happens in spread

        Parameters:
        _Type - the type to be set

      • Advance

        public boolean Advance()
        This method will return true if this virus can advance. if it's an deactivated virus, after default(5) turns, it will become activated.
        Returns:
        Whether it can advance or not

      • blowup

        public void blowup()
        This method will remove both right and left head and fused tiles, destroy all FuseViruses on screen, delete tiles under them, and add corruption as well as put corruption in their place

        nothing happens in the FuseVirus turnBasedUpdate everything happens in spread

        public void markForDelete()
        Deactivate (but do not mark for delete) this FuseVirus if the counterpart is also deactivated, mark for delete both BOT and TOP as well as any contiguous FUSED types

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
